items.sentence: Please be careful that you don\'t break this vase.
Please make sure that the dog doesn\'t go outside.
Please tell Tom I\'ll call again tomorrow morning.
We still don\'t know what\'s going to happen next.
If I\'d had more money, I\'d have bought that pen.
How do you know that Tom has never been to Boston?
How do you think Tom will cope with the situation?
How long have Tom and Mary been dating each other?
I have an old computer that I don\'t want anymore.
Tom will be mad when he finds out what I\'ve done.
